member.param: Limit price, only for limit orders
Time in force, only for limit orders
Post only flag, invalid when timeInForce is IOC
Orders not displaying in order book. When hidden chose
Only visible portion of the order is displayed in the order book
The maximum visible size of an iceberg order
Quantity of contract to buy or sell
A mark to reduce the position size only. Set to false by default
A mark to close the position. Set to false by default. All the positions will be closed if true

A mark to forcely hold the funds for an order, even though it's an order to reduce the position size. This helps the order stay on the order book and not get canceled when the position size changes. Set to false by default

The network name of asset, e.g. The available value for USDT are OMNI, ERC20, TRC20, default is ERC20. This only apply for multi-chain currency, and there is no need for single chain currency.

member.param: The note that is left on the withdrawal address. When you withdraw from KuCoin to other platforms, you need to fill in memo(tag). If you don't fill in memo(tag), your withdrawal may not be available.
Internal withdrawal or not. Default false.
The chain name of asset, e.g. The available value for USDT are OMNI, ERC20, TRC20, default is OMNI. This only apply for multi-chain currency, and there is no need for single chain currency.

member.summary: Subscribe to full order book updates

member.name: M:Kucoin.Net.Interfaces.IKucoinSocketClientSpot.SubscribeToMatchEngineUpdatesAsync(System.String,System.Action{CryptoExchange.Net.Sockets.DataEvent{Kucoin.Net.Objects.Spot.Socket.KucoinStreamMatchEngineUpdate}})

summary.para: Subscribe to match engine updates. There are different update types with classes derived from
: A valid order is received by the matching engine
: A limit order is opened on the order book
: An order is no longer on the order book
: An order is matched with another order
: An order is changed (decreased) in quantity

member.returns: A stream subscription. This stream subscription can be used to be notified when the socket is disconnected/reconnected and to unsubscribe

member.name: M:Kucoin.Net.Interfaces.IKucoinSocketClientSpot.SubscribeToMatchEngineUpdatesAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Action{CryptoExchange.Net.Sockets.DataEvent{Kucoin.Net.Objects.Spot.Socket.KucoinStreamMatchEngineUpdate}})

summary.para: Subscribe to match engine updates. There are different update types with classes derived from
: A valid order is received by the matching engine
: A limit order is opened on the order book
: An order is no longer on the order book
: An order is matched with another order
: An order is changed (decreased) in quantity

member.returns: A stream subscription. This stream subscription can be used to be notified when the socket is disconnected/reconnected and to unsubscribe

member.summary: Subscribe to order updates for your own orders
member.returns: A stream subscription. This stream subscription can be used to be notified when the socket is disconnected/reconnected and to unsubscribe

member.name: M:Kucoin.Net.Objects.KucoinApiCredentials.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates new api credentials. Keep this information safe.

member.name: M:Kucoin.Net.Objects.KucoinApiCredentials.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create Api credentials providing a stream containing json data. The json data should include three values: apiKey, apiSecret and apiPassPhrase
member.param: The stream containing the json data
A key to identify the credentials for the API. For example, when set to `binanceKey` the json data should contain a value for the property `binanceKey`. Defaults to 'apiKey'.
A key to identify the credentials for the API. For example, when set to `binanceSecret` the json data should contain a value for the property `binanceSecret`. Defaults to 'apiSecret'.
A key to identify the credentials for the API. For example, when set to `kucoinPass` the json data should contain a value for the property `kucoinPass`. Defaults to 'apiPassPhrase'.
